select Member.gamesCategoryadmin_id,Member.member_id as admin_id,member_name,member_nick_name,member_gender,member_register_telphone,member_register_email,gamesCategorycreate_time,member_authority,member_status ,Member_Authority.Mau_id,MAuthority_Menus.Mau_name,Member_Authority.Mau_authority from Member_Authority left join MAuthority_Menus on Member_Authority.Mau_id=MAuthority_Menus.Mau_id left join Member on Member_Authority.member_id=Member.member_id
gamesCategoryadmin_id=#{gamesCategoryadmin_id}

select sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as January, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as February, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as March, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '4' then 1 else 0 end) as April, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '5' then 1 else 0 end) as May, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '6' then 1 else 0 end) as June, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '7' then 1 else 0 end) as July, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '8' then 1 else 0 end) as August, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '9' then 1 else 0 end) as September, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '10' then 1 else 0 end) as October, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '11' then 1 else 0 end) as November, sum(case month(gamesCategorycreate_time) when '12' then 1 else 0 end) as December from member
year(gamesCategorycreate_time)=#{gamesCategorycreate_time}

select sum(case month(upload_time) when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as januaryUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as februaryUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as marchUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '4' then 1 else 0 end) as aprilUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '5' then 1 else 0 end) as mayUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '6' then 1 else 0 end) as juneUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '7' then 1 else 0 end) as julyUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '8' then 1 else 0 end) as augustUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '9' then 1 else 0 end) as septemberUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '10' then 1 else 0 end) as octoberUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '11' then 1 else 0 end) as novemberUpload, sum(case month(upload_time) when '12' then 1 else 0 end) as decemberUpload from game_travel_article
